chunks.cleaned_english_translation:
THE END.

Singing a hymn with a faithful voice, I reject Arius and the barking of Sabellius. I never agree with Simon's grunting whispers.

With zeal for Christ, I am fervent in his name. For the Holy Mother Church has nourished me with Catholic teachings through all time from her sacred breast.
chunks.original_latin:
FINIS. Hymnum fideli modulando gutture,
Arium sperno, latrantem Sabellium:
Assensi numquam grunnienti Simoni
Aure susurra. Zeloque Christi sum zelatus nomine:
Sancta nam mater lacte me catholico
Tempus per omne Ecclesia nutrivit
Ubere sacro.
